name: 丽萨·瓦加
birth_place: 美国,印第安纳州,南本德
introduction: My name is Lisa Varga. I grew up in South Bend, Indiana and later moved to Los Angeles to pursue my dream as an actress.I have been a proud member of the Screen Actors Guild (SAG) since 1996 but started my career in modeling at the age of 16. I feel very blessed to be part of such an exciting industry. I am still active in both modeling and acting and recently got involved in writing and producing.I have lived in Los Angeles, New York, and Miami. I currently reside in Los Angeles.A few exciting updates... I was recently in an episode for the new Showtime series called "HOMELAND". My character's name was "Demmie". I also co-starred in a TV Movie for NBC called "GAME TIME: TACKLING THE PAST" I played "Karen Walker". It aired on NBC Sept. 3, 2011 and is now available on DVD.I am surrounded by a loving family, I have great friends, and I consider myself to be very blessed. I also have 3 cats that I adore. I do all I can to support animal charities and organizations, and I am also a big supporter of cancer charities - my brother Shane is a 2 time cancer survivor...and my hero. He just had a stem cell transplant and has an amazing story. Check out his inspirational video: www.shanevarga.comThank you for taking the time to visit my site.  Love and Blessings.
